item.title: Alex add a quote by Robert jordan
item.description: "An open sack hides nothing, And an open door hides little, but an open man is surely hiding something. lini is quoted by Nynaeve." -- Robert jordan

item.title: Alex add a quote by Robert Jordan
item.description: "The fact that the price must be paid is proof it is worth paying." -- Robert Jordan

item.title: Alex add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Alex add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Wise? No, I simply learned to think." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: Alex add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided." -- J.K. Rowling

item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alex add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Wit beyond measure is a man's greatest treasure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alex add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Alex add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alex add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I'm going to keep going until I succeed â€” or die. Don't think I don't know how this might end. I've known it for years." -- J.K. Rowling
